subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Martin Brodeur stopped 24 shots to reach 40 victories for a record seventh time, and Jay Pandolfo had a goal and an assist Saturday for the Devils in a 4-2 victory over Colorado.
snippet: Martin Brodeur stopped 24 shots to reach 40 victories for a record seventh time, and Jay Pandolfo had a goal and an assist Saturday for the Devils in a 4-2 victory over Colorado.
